title: Trie Word Search
question: In a word search problem using a Trie, why is it more efficient to build a Trie from the dictionary words rather than searching for each word individually?
options: The Trie allows early termination of searches for invalid prefixes
The Trie takes less memory than storing individual words
The Trie enables O(1) search time for any word
The Trie automatically sorts the dictionary words
